analysis.description:
MajorityGame.sendAwardToLastOne (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#369-395) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(lastAddress).transfer(uint256(finalBalance / 50)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#388-390)
	- address(officialAddress).transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#392-395)

MajorityGameFactory.setJackpot (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#53-63) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-mGame.setJackpot.value(val)() (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#60-62)

MajorityGame.sendAward has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.sendAwardToLastOne() (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#360-361)

MajorityGame.sendAward has external calls inside a loop:
	- this.sendAwardToLastOne() (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#363)

MajorityGame.sendAwardToLastOne has external calls inside a loop:
	- address(first6AddresstList[k]).transfer(awardFirst6) (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#385-386)
Parameter '_gameBet' of MajorityGameFactory.createGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#27) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_endTime' of MajorityGameFactory.createGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#27) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_questionText' of MajorityGameFactory.createGame (/unique_chucks/8/0x1c8c70478e92abc44843245bd6d88035236b4ed9.sol#27) is not in mixedCase
